name: Azari & III
description: '''Azari & III''' (pronounced "Azari and Third") was a Canadian music group, formed in 2008, which performed [[house music|house]], [[electronic music|electronic]] and [[dance music]]. They released their [[Azari & III (album)|self-titled debut album]] in 2011 and earned recognition on the dance music scene with the hits "Hungry for the Power" and "Reckless (With Your Love)".
